Quick search

setup.py¶

setup.py is the main PETGEM setup script, it is based on python setup-module.

setup.description()[source]¶

Descripton of PETGEM code

setup.get_ext_modules()[source]¶

Get paths of extension modules.

Param:None
Returns:numpy path include
setup.long_description()[source]¶

Read long description of petgem of DESCRIPTION.rst file.

Param:None
Returns:petgem description
Return type:string
setup.name()[source]¶

Set name for petgem package.

Param:None
Returns:petgem name
Return type:string
